img_above_text:
![Wukong MiddleHollow 25.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/7/77/Wukong_MiddleHollow_25.jpg)
Be wary of one of the mushrooms you can harvest here, as its actually a powerful Fungiman in disguise.
img_below_text:
As you drop down, be sure to look to the right for a **Meditation Spot** , and over to the left you'll find the Middle Hollow Shrine guarded by an archer and Puppet Spider.
The Tree, Middle of the Hollow Meditation Spot

img_summary: The image depicts a scene from the game "Black Myth: Wukong," showcasing a character navigating through the Middle Hollow area. The character is equipped with a flaming staff, suggesting readiness for combat or exploration. The setting is a dimly lit cave with lush vegetation and rocky terrain, hinting at the presence of hidden threats, such as a disguised Fungiman among the harvestable mushrooms. The narrative context advises caution and exploration, as players should be aware of potential dangers and opportunities, like finding a Meditation Spot and a shrine guarded by enemies.
